General.Name: Neurizer Ltd
General.Description: NeuRizer Ltd. focuses on producing carbon neutral fertilisers in Australia. It has NeuRizer Urea project that deliver nitrogen-based fertilizers for agricultural markets in south Australia. NeuRizer Ltd. was formerly known as Leigh Creek Energy Limited and changed its name to NeuRizer Ltd. in March 2022. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Adelaide, Australia.
